extendedInfo.description: You can use iHear Network to listen to content from Facebook, Twitter, and Pocket (formerly Read It Later). You may also read and share articles and posts like you would with any social browser.Tune into iHear Network:â¢ During your commute to workâ¢ Over lunch, dinner, or a snackâ¢ While exercising or going for a walk, run, or jogâ¢ As you do choresâ¢ Before going to bedOr, whenever you want to be informed!You can quit the app by pressing your phone's menu button and selecting "Quit".Android usually comes with several pre-installed voices. You can see these voices from within the app by selecting "Settings" from the menu and pressing on the voice chooser. Additionally, over 35 premium voices made by SVOX are available for purchase. Simply press the "Add a Voice!" button in the "Settings" dialog for more information.IVONA offers several free "beta" voices that you can test for a limited time:http://connect.ihearnetwork.com/ivona.htmlIf you speak Japanese (æ¥æ¬èª), you might want to purchase the AquesTalk TTS engine:http://connect.ihearnetwork.com/aquestalk.htmlSpecial emotive and novelty voices are available from CereProc:http://connect.ihearnetwork.com/cereproc.htmlBesides listening to your social news feeds, you can also tune in to our curated iHear Channels. These channels include, but are not limited to, the following:Sports==================FanGraphs Baseball Â· Sporting News Â· Sporting News NBA Â· Yahoo! reviews.title: Why force us to use an account!
reviews.comment: It was working fine before without making us use a third party for account sign in. I have no desire to be coerced into sharing, especially with the third parties offered.
reviews.author: friendly geek

reviews.title: Missing feature
reviews.comment: I installed this for the ihear network but it only gives me the choices of Facebook, Twitter, and Pocket. Where is the ihear network stuff?
reviews.author: David Celestin

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I just started using this app and it is now my favorite app to use while driving. I don\'t have to stare down at the screen while driving and now I just click play and have my news feed read to me! thanks for developing.
reviews.author: Robby Gall

reviews.title: Sucks now
reviews.comment: It used to be good. Now I can\'t bring up any channels or feeds. Just go back to the original local based tweets when it was good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Twitter integration is broken
reviews.author: James Koch

reviews.title: wonderful app and performance issues are fixed
reviews.comment: I love the concept of this app, to listen to my twitter feed while walking, driving, or even while doing chores or exercising. Previously the app was slow on my phone, but after the recent update and reinstalling it, it works great now. I use it with Ivona. 5 stars!!
reviews.author: Geoff Peters

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: This app would originally let you use a map view to see everything but now you can only see who you follow on twitter or Facebook its no fun anymore.
reviews.author: indigo hamilton

reviews.title: Tried to use it to read tweets
reviews.comment: Instant error. Instant follow demand. Instant up sell. #fail
reviews.author: Tony Godshall

reviews.title: Works with ivona not with svox
reviews.comment: I am glad devs fixed the issue with changing voices but still it does not play with SVOX Victoria and Grace. When I select these voices I can only hear beep between articles. If I select pico, Samsung or Ivona, everything works fine. Fix that issue and it is an excellent app with 5+ stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app with pocket
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very convenient
reviews.comment: Like this app a lot.  Have been using it since I heard about it on Thrive Forums. I use it while in the car to catch up on world and tech news.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome, needs some work though
reviews.comment: The idea for this app is brilliant. I read the news everyday while setting up at work, this app would make everything a lot easier. Just a couple taps and I\'m good to go. The only thing I think they need to work on is the smoothness of the speaker.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Love the idea, but this crashes and has issues with the voice engine. Also you appear to be forced to use one of the voices supplied with or bought as an add-on of the app, as opposed to other TTS products. Not a big problem, admittedly, but when you have a favourite... I\'ll give it five stars when it works for me...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: After playing around with it, I kinda like it. It is easy to use and there are several channels for you to choose from. Would recommend downloading it and try it out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very good no problems
reviews.comment: great for twitter, but the voice add-on a must.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool concept, but buggy
reviews.comment: I love the idea behind this app. For the visually impaired, or those who really need their media on the go, this app does it all. However, I could not get it to work properly on Droid 2.3, VM Optimus Slider. Kept getting the error \"Could not write speech files to SD card\" anytime I tried to add a new channel (either via iHear or twitter/facebook). App permissions are set appropriately, and SD card has several GB of free space available. Overall, cool app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smooth
reviews.comment: App is very easy to use. I will keep it on my phone .Would like to see some work on the flow of words. Sometimes hard to understand reading a news article!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good program
reviews.comment: Very much enjoy using it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mainak awesome
reviews.comment: Its grt to use and fun to listn . Its realy fun and easy to work
reviews.author: A Google User
